amendment.description: To provide for an exemption to a minimum wage increase for certain employers who contribute to their employees health benefit expenses.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 195 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 195 proposed by Senator Burr to Amendment SA 100. (consideration: CR S1172; text: CR S1172) To provide for an exemption to a minimum wage increase for certain employers who contribute to their employees health benefit expenses.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 195 proposed by Senator Burr to Amendment SA 100.
